definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
discriminant (e.g. b^2-4ac in the formula for the roots of a quadratic equation)

sentences.english: This is the multi-category statistical analysis based on the information entropy.
sentences.chinese: 这就是基于信息熵的多类统计判别分析。

sentences.english: This method of judgment can acquire a good result in image recognition.
sentences.chinese: 这种判别方法，在图象识别中取得了较好效果。

sentences.english: The role of tibia variables of Macaca mulatta in the Taihang Mountains in the sex determination was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究成年太行山猕猴胫骨变量在性别判别中的作用。

sentences.english: A novel recognition method called Active Discriminant Function (ADF) for handwriting recognition is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种新的基于主动判别函数的手写体识别方法。

sentences.english: Then a discriminatory method for "T-value" is given.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上列出T值的判别法。

sentences.english: The discriminant analysis is one kind of statistics method that is used to differentiate the individual which colony is affiliated.
sentences.chinese: 判别分析是用于判别个体所属群体的一种统计方法。

sentences.english: The discriminant analysis is one kind of statistics method that is used to differentiate the individual which colony is affiliated.
sentences.chinese: 判别分析是用于判别个体所属群体的一种统计方法。

sentences.english: MANOVA analysis and follow up Discriminant Analysis are employed.
sentences.chinese: 采用MANOVA分析及跟踪判别分析方法。

sentences.english: The exclamatory markers are especially important for the recognition of the non-typical exclamatory intonation.
sentences.chinese: 感叹标记对于非典型感叹语调的判别有重要作用。

sentences.english: The stability of underground gallery ordinarily distinguished by periphery displacement.
sentences.chinese: 地下坑道的稳定性一般以坑道周边位移来判别。

sentences.english: Studied the generalizability of Eisenstein discriminance.
sentences.chinese: 研究了艾森斯坦判别法的推广。

sentences.english: Using differential pressure sensor to distinguish the number of up-and-down and count it.
sentences.chinese: 采用压差式传感器实现上下人数的判别和计数。

sentences.english: The discriminant parameter for the sedimentological environment determining, calculated by the statistical parameters of grain size, also shows the same result.
sentences.chinese: 环境判别参数也显示泥炭灰分来源为风成的。

sentences.english: In this paper, we establish some criteria to present the uniformly continuous function.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了几个判别函数一致连续性的方法。

sentences.english: A simple method was thus given for evaluating the liquefaction potential of sand by static cone penetration tests.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一个用静力触探判别砂土液化势的实用方法。

definition: to differentiate/to distinguish/to discriminate/also written 辨別|辨别
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
to screen/to discriminate/to reexamine a case/screening (of applicants etc)
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to distinguish (between different things)/to make distinctions clear
to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
